Description: The workhorse of Alliance missile weapons. Highly versatile and can either be directly launched at detected tracks or, using the guidance systems, steered using waypoints to initiate surprise attacks on targets, allowing the missile to find its own targets. Upon reaching the final waypoint, the Thunderhead will activate its on-board radar system and actively guide itself into the nearest target. However, the missile cannot turn back should it lose the target, and is easily defeated by radar-disruption. Size: 2 Cruise Speed: 200 m/s Range: 14,000 m Warhead: Type: Explosive Impact Armor Penetration: 150 cm Component Damage: 1200 hp Blast Angle: 70 Seeker: Type: Active - RADAR Range: 2,000 m FOV: 50 deg Gain: 25 dB Power: 150 kW Supports TRPs: Yes
